name: StalinGulag
detailed_description:
StalinGULAG is a town-planning simulator with elements of survival. You are responsible for the leadership of the camp system of the Soviet Union. Turn the frosty Siberian piece of land into a thriving GULAG, giving prisoners everything they need - food, tools, clothes and medicines. The surplus may turn against you and the local rebellion will grow into something more.

Features
  • Complete the tasks of the party in the campaign or create your own camp in the economic mode.

  • Build, mine, produce and sell resources to local villages and cities.

  • Strengthen your camp. Thick walls and armed guards can come in handy at the most unexpected moment

  • Keep an eye on the moral and physical condition of your prisoners. Get rid of pockets of discontent in time.

  • A large number of random events will force competent disposing of resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X3 440 and better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT440 and better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
